abstract: Álvaro Fernández (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈalβaɾo ferˈnandes]; born 11 October 1985 in Villa Soriano) is a Uruguayan footballer. He currently plays as a midfielder for argentine club Gimnasia y Esgrima La Plata on loan from the Chicago Fire.
comment: Álvaro Fernández (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈalβaɾo ferˈnandes]; born 11 October 1985 in Villa Soriano) is a Uruguayan footballer. He currently plays as a midfielder for argentine club Gimnasia y Esgrima La Plata on loan from the Chicago Fire.
